body:
Try clearning your browser cache...

On Wed, Nov 13, 2013 at 7:18 PM, Ondřej Čertík notifications@github.comwrote:

> When trying the latest master (af80839https://github.com/ipython/ipython/commit/af808396f3b0206664e857cf10a978dc4b79c4f6),
> I got:
> 
> ondrej@kittiwake:/tmp$ ~/repos/hashstack2/yy/bin/ipython notebook
> 2013-11-13 17:15:44.932 [NotebookApp] Using existing profile dir: u'/auto/nest/nest/u/ondrej/.ipython/profile_default'
> 2013-11-13 17:15:44.938 [NotebookApp] Using MathJax from CDN: http://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js
> 2013-11-13 17:15:44.964 [NotebookApp] Serving notebooks from local directory: /tmp
> 2013-11-13 17:15:44.965 [NotebookApp] 0 active kernels
> 2013-11-13 17:15:44.965 [NotebookApp] The IPython Notebook is running at: http://127.0.0.1:8888/
> 2013-11-13 http://127.0.0.1:8888/2013-11-13 17:15:44.965 [NotebookApp] Use Control-C to stop this server and shut down all kernels (twice to skip confirmation).
> 2013-11-13 17:15:44.965 [NotebookApp] WARNING | Probably won't be able to open notebook  because it is not in notebook_dir /tmp
> 2013-11-13 17:15:45.098 [tornado.access] 200 GET /tree (127.0.0.1) 29.44ms
> 2013-11-13 17:15:45.286 [tornado.access] 302 GET /notebooks?_=1384388145181 (127.0.0.1) 0.68ms
> 2013-11-13 17:15:45.290 [tornado.access] 200 GET /clusters?_=1384388145182 (127.0.0.1) 4.01ms
> 2013-11-13 17:15:45.322 [tornado.access] 304 GET /tree (127.0.0.1) 0.92ms
> 
> And in the browser, the Dashboard says "Error connecting to server.". When
> I click on New Notebook, I get:
> 
> 404: Not Found
> 
> as the only text on the page.
> 
> Any idea what is going on?
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHubhttps://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/4535
> .

## 

Brian E. Granger
Cal Poly State University, San Luis Obispo
bgranger@calpoly.edu and ellisonbg@gmail.com
Ah, that was it! Thanks, that wouldn't occur to me. Feel free to close this issue. I don't know if this is a bug in IPython, or whether it is a bug in my older Firefox 19.0.2.
